containers.name: Jupyter Notebook Bio Python
lifecycle-post-start: export IAM=`whoami`; rm -rf /home/$IAM/pd/dockerHome; ln -s $(pwd) /home/$IAM/pd/dockerHome; mkdir -p /home/$IAM/.jupyter/custom; echo "define(['base/js/namespace'], function(Jupyter){Jupyter._target = '_self';})" >/home/$IAM/.jupyter/custom/custom.js; ln -s /data /home/$IAM/pd/; true
